name: Maze of Ghosts
description:
This is the first game made using my own game engine, Flux Engine.

This is a game about reaching the end of a maze filled with monsters, with only your past lives as your guide. Since this is a game jam game, there are only 4 levels, and this game can be beaten in 5 minutes or less.

This game was created in 3 days for Wowie! Jam 3.0. Flux Engine is still in early stages of development, so many important features, like good graphics and sound, are still lacking.

This game and Flux Engine are written in C++ and OpenGL, and run in the web via WebGL and Emscripten.
